channel.title: Go_Reversing on fernetInjection

item.title: cliBrowser
item.description: First impressions and reversing This challenge consisted of a hint: Man I am so tired of that cringe web stack, it’s such a joke. So I made my web app in the cli, because what’s better than fancy terminal And a binary named client that upon execution printed a banner (very cool btw) and displayed a prompt. I started by entering some random input and got back invalid input provided, so the logical step was to search for this string.
